DOC.brief_title: Adherence Health Effects Video Dance Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Participants must female age 5065 currently exercise least 20 minute three time per week BMI 25 high Exclusions largely related medical safety include history osteoporosis , osteoporotic fracture , active cardiovascular disease , uncontrolled hypertension , weight bearing pain would limit exercise , seizure disorder medical condition medication would limit safety study .
